other_tests.findings: Dependent atelectases present in the visualized lung bases; no pleural effusion; unremarkable visualized heart and pericardium; diverticulosis throughout the colon; marked inflammatory stranding and wall thickening within the sigmoid colon; multiple foci of extraluminal air adjacent to the sigmoid colon and throughout the abdomen; small hiatal hernia with reflux of contrast; otherwise, unremarkable stomach, small bowel, and normal appendix.
